title.zh: 兰州：凝心聚力 逐梦同行
title.en: Lanzhou: Unite Hearts and Strength, Pursue Dreams Together

subtitle.zh: 西北区血友病医学交流大会暨组织赋能培训会
subtitle.en: Northwest Region Hemophilia Medical Exchange Conference and Organizational Empowerment Training

description.zh: 「凝心聚力 逐梦同行」西北区血友病医学交流大会暨组织赋能培训会由兰州大学第一医院血液科（血友病诊疗中心）、甘肃血友之家、天津市友爱罕见病关爱服务中心主办。血友姐妹会负责人左钰洁以《看见血友病群体的「另一半」，她们也会流血》为题做分享，向西北地区的专家和患者介绍血友病女性群体的现状和需求。
description.en: The 'Unite Hearts and Strength, Pursue Dreams Together' Northwest Region Hemophilia Medical Exchange Conference and Organizational Empowerment Training was hosted by the Department of Hematology (Hemophilia Diagnosis and Treatment Center) of the First Hospital of Lanzhou University, Gansu Hemophilia Home, and Tianjin Friendship Rare Disease Care Service Center. Yujie (Ruby) Zuo, leader of the Hemophilia Sisters team, gave a presentation titled 'Seeing the "Other Half" of the Hemophilia Community, They Also Bleed', introducing the current situation and needs of the female hemophilia community to experts and patients in the Northwest region.

title.zh: 微信公众号：兰州会议报道
